Decision_Outcome: The application for judicial review is allowed
Remedy_Requested: Re-determination of the case by a different Board

Legal_Provision_Cited: Subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Relief_Sought: Judicial review and re-hearing of the case
Governing_Rule: Procedural fairness requires that parties be given an opportunity to respond to significant evidence
